data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guzmán, Ali Abadallan, Joya, Daniel Chirivi, Francke, Oscar F. (2015): The first troglomorphic species of the genus Phrynus Lamarck, 1801 (Amblypygi: Phrynidae) from Mexico. Zootaxa 3920 (3): 474-482, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3920.3.6
